duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide overall leadership for cross-functional teams in Sales and Marketing to facilitate growth strategy and product development strategy.
Organize, plan, staff, and lead the sales and marketing efforts, as well as drive business value creation.
Develop and implement business development, marketing, and sales strategies for the company.
Manage and develop the Sales Team and implement business development, sales, and marketing strategies to promote sales growth and customer satisfaction.
Lead the execution of comprehensive marketing plans to support sales and revenue objectives.
Work closely with cross-functional leaders to improve the company’s ability to exceed customer expectations at all levels.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree (or higher) in Marketing, Business, or related field
